description: Report data as defined by the bank's financial spreading systems and credit policy.
condition: Data must be consistent with the bank's financial spreading systems and credit policy.

description: Report the most recent financial statement data available as of the report date.
condition: Data must reflect the most recent financial data in the consolidated holding company’s financial spreading system as of the report date.

description: NetSalesCurrent, OperatingIncome, DepreciationAmortization, InterestExpense, NetIncomeCurrent, and TotalLiabilities should be reported for the most recently available trailing twelve month (TTM) period.
condition: Values should represent the TTM period ending on the DateFinancials.

description: NetSalesPriorYear and NetIncomePriorYear should be reported for the TTM period ended one year prior to the date indicated in DateFinancials.
condition: Values should represent the TTM period ending one year prior to DateFinancials.

description: If trailing twelve months of financial information is unavailable, provide the underwritten annual information for NetSalesCurrent, OperatingIncome, DepreciationAmortization, InterestExpense, NetIncomeCurrent and TotalLiabilities.
condition: If TTM data is unavailable, the underwritten annual information should be used.

description: If trailing twelve months of financial information is unavailable, provide the underwritten annual information for NetSalesPriorYear and NetIncomePriorYear.
condition: If TTM data is unavailable, the underwritten annual information should be used.

description: Data should be provided in a single extensible markup language file (.xml).
condition: Data must be submitted as a single .xml file.

description: No quotation marks should be used as text identifiers.
condition: Text fields should not contain quotation marks.

description: The file should not contain a header row or a row count.
condition: The .xml file should not include a header row or any row count information.

description: InternalObligorID should not contain spaces.
condition: Value should not contain any whitespace characters.

description: ObligorName should not contain special characters other than hyphens or periods.
condition: Value should only contain alphanumeric characters, hyphens, or periods.

description: City should only contain alphabetic characters.
condition: Value should only contain letters.

description: Country should be a valid ISO country code.
condition: Value must be a valid ISO country code.

description: IndustryCode should be a valid NAICS code.
condition: Value must be a valid NAICS code.

description: InternalRating should follow the bank's internal rating scale format.
condition: Value must conform to the bank's internal rating scale.

description: FacilityType should be one of the predefined facility types.
condition: Value should match one of the allowed facility types.

description: CreditFacilityPurpose should be one of the predefined credit facility purposes.
condition: Value should match one of the allowed purposes.

description: LienPosition should be a positive integer.
condition: Value must be a positive whole number.

description: InterestRate should be within a reasonable range (e.g., 0 to 100).
condition: Value should be between 0 and 100.

description: InterestRateSpread should be within a reasonable range (e.g., -10 to 1000).
condition: Value should be between -10 and 1000.

description: CommittedExposure should be greater than or equal to UtilizedExposure.
condition: CommittedExposure >= UtilizedExposure

description: CumulativeChargeoffs should not be greater than CommittedExposure.
condition: CumulativeChargeoffs <= CommittedExposure

description: CurrentAssetsCurrent should be greater than AccountsReceivableCurrent.
condition: CurrentAssetsCurrent > AccountsReceivableCurrent

description: CurrentAssetsPriorYear should be greater than AccountsReceivablePriorYear.
condition: CurrentAssetsPriorYear > AccountsReceivablePriorYear

description: TotalAssetsCurrent should be greater than CurrentAssetsCurrent.
condition: TotalAssetsCurrent > CurrentAssetsCurrent

description: TotalAssetsPriorYear should be greater than CurrentAssetsPriorYear.
condition: TotalAssetsPriorYear > CurrentAssetsPriorYear

description: TotalLiabilities should be less than TotalAssetsCurrent.
condition: TotalLiabilities < TotalAssetsCurrent

description: TotalLiabilities should be less than TotalAssetsPriorYear.
condition: TotalLiabilities < TotalAssetsPriorYear

description: ShortTermDebt should be less than CurrentLiabilitiesCurrent.
condition: ShortTermDebt < CurrentLiabilitiesCurrent

description: ShortTermDebt should be less than CurrentLiabilitiesPriorYear.
condition: ShortTermDebt < CurrentLiabilitiesPriorYear

description: The DateFinancials must be before the current date.
condition: DateFinancials < current date

description: The DateLastAudit must be before the current date.
condition: DateLastAudit < current date

description: The MaturityDate must be after the OriginationDate.
condition: MaturityDate > OriginationDate

description: If NonAccrualDate is populated, it must be after the OriginationDate.
condition: If NonAccrualDate is present, then NonAccrualDate > OriginationDate

description: GuarantorInternalID should not be equal to InternalObligorID if GuarantorFlag is 'Yes'.
condition: If GuarantorFlag = 'Yes', then GuarantorInternalID != InternalObligorID

description: If GuarantorFlag is 'Yes', then GuarantorName should be populated.
condition: If GuarantorFlag = 'Yes', then GuarantorName is not null or empty.

description: EntityInternalID should not be equal to InternalObligorID.
condition: EntityInternalID != InternalObligorID

description: If the StockExchange is populated, then the TickerSymbol should also be populated.
condition: If StockExchange is present, then TickerSymbol is not null or empty.

description: If the StockExchange is populated, then the CUSIP should also be populated.
condition: If StockExchange is present, then CUSIP is not null or empty.

description: IndustryCodeType must be one of the allowed types
condition: Value should match one of the allowed industry code types.

description: OriginalInternalObligorID should not contain spaces.
condition: Value should not contain any whitespace characters.

description: GuarantorName should not contain special characters other than hyphens or periods.
condition: Value should only contain alphanumeric characters, hyphens, or periods.

description: EntityName should not contain special characters other than hyphens or periods.
condition: Value should only contain alphanumeric characters, hyphens, or periods.

description: DateFinancials must be after DateLastAudit.
condition: DateFinancials > DateLastAudit

description: AccountsReceivableCurrent should be less than or equal to NetSalesCurrent.
condition: AccountsReceivableCurrent <= NetSalesCurrent

description: AccountsReceivablePriorYear should be less than or equal to NetSalesPriorYear.
condition: AccountsReceivablePriorYear <= NetSalesPriorYear

description: InventoryCurrent should be less than or equal to CurrentAssetsCurrent.
condition: InventoryCurrent <= CurrentAssetsCurrent

description: InventoryPriorYear should be less than or equal to CurrentAssetsPriorYear.
condition: InventoryPriorYear <= CurrentAssetsPriorYear

description: AccountsPayableCurrent should be less than or equal to CurrentLiabilitiesCurrent.
condition: AccountsPayableCurrent <= CurrentLiabilitiesCurrent

description: AccountsPayablePriorYear should be less than or equal to CurrentLiabilitiesPriorYear.
condition: AccountsPayablePriorYear <= CurrentLiabilitiesPriorYear

description: CurrentMaturitiesLongTermDebt should be less than or equal to LongTermDebt.
condition: CurrentMaturitiesLongTermDebt <= LongTermDebt

description: The absolute difference between NetSalesCurrent and NetSalesPriorYear should be within a reasonable percentage.
condition: ABS(NetSalesCurrent - NetSalesPriorYear) / NetSalesPriorYear <= 0.5

description: The absolute difference between NetIncomeCurrent and NetIncomePriorYear should be within a reasonable percentage.
condition: ABS(NetIncomeCurrent - NetIncomePriorYear) / NetIncomePriorYear <= 0.5

description: OperatingIncome should be less than or equal to NetSalesCurrent.
condition: OperatingIncome <= NetSalesCurrent

description: The ZipCodeForeignMailingCode should conform to the format for the specified Country.
condition: ZipCodeForeignMailingCode format matches Country's postal code format.

description: TIN should conform to the format for the specified Country.
condition: TIN format matches Country's tax identification number format.

description: StockExchange should be a valid stock exchange code.
condition: Value must be a valid stock exchange code.

description: TickerSymbol should be a valid symbol for the StockExchange.
condition: TickerSymbol must be a valid symbol listed on StockExchange.

description: If InterestRateVariability is 'Variable', then InterestRateIndex should be populated.
condition: If InterestRateVariability = 'Variable', then InterestRateIndex is not null or empty.

description: If InterestRateVariability is 'Variable', then InterestRateSpread should be populated.
condition: If InterestRateVariability = 'Variable', then InterestRateSpread is not null.

description: If InterestRateVariability is 'Capped', then InterestRateCeiling should be populated.
condition: If InterestRateVariability = 'Capped', then InterestRateCeiling is not null.

description: If InterestRateVariability is 'Floored', then InterestRateFloor should be populated.
condition: If InterestRateVariability = 'Floored', then InterestRateFloor is not null.

description: If InterestRateCeiling is populated, it should be greater than or equal to InterestRate.
condition: If InterestRateCeiling is present, then InterestRateCeiling >= InterestRate.

description: If InterestRateFloor is populated, it should be less than or equal to InterestRate.
condition: If InterestRateFloor is present, then InterestRateFloor <= InterestRate.

description: If GuarantorFlag is 'Yes', then GuarantorInternalRiskRating should be populated.
condition: If GuarantorFlag = 'Yes', then GuarantorInternalRiskRating is not null or empty.

description: PastDue should not be greater than UtilizedExposure.
condition: PastDue <= UtilizedExposure

description: InternalObligorID should not be equal to GuarantorInternalID.
condition: InternalObligorID != GuarantorInternalID

description: The sum of CurrentMaturitiesLongTermDebt and ShortTermDebt should be less than or equal to CurrentLiabilitiesCurrent.
condition: CurrentMaturitiesLongTermDebt + ShortTermDebt <= CurrentLiabilitiesCurrent

description: The sum of AccountsPayableCurrent and ShortTermDebt should be less than or equal to CurrentLiabilitiesCurrent.
condition: AccountsPayableCurrent + ShortTermDebt <= CurrentLiabilitiesCurrent

description: The sum of AccountsPayablePriorYear and ShortTermDebt should be less than or equal to CurrentLiabilitiesPriorYear.
condition: AccountsPayablePriorYear + ShortTermDebt <= CurrentLiabilitiesPriorYear

description: If InterestRate is populated, it must be less than or equal to InterestRateCeiling.
condition: If InterestRate is present, then InterestRate <= InterestRateCeiling.

description: If InterestRate is populated, it must be greater than or equal to InterestRateFloor.
condition: If InterestRate is present, then InterestRate >= InterestRateFloor.

description: If InterestRateSpread is populated, it must be less than or equal to InterestRateCeiling.

description: If InterestRateSpread is populated, it must be greater than or equal to InterestRateFloor.
condition: If InterestRateSpread is present, then InterestRateSpread >= InterestRateFloor.

description: InterestRateSpread should be within a reasonable range based on the InterestRateIndex.
condition: InterestRateSpread should fall within the typical range for the chosen InterestRateIndex.

description: If NetIncomeCurrent is positive, then OperatingIncome should also be positive.
condition: If NetIncomeCurrent > 0, then OperatingIncome > 0.

description: If NetIncomePriorYear is positive, then OperatingIncome should also be positive.
condition: If NetIncomePriorYear > 0, then OperatingIncome > 0.

description: OriginationDate must be before MaturityDate.
condition: OriginationDate < MaturityDate

description: OriginationDate must be before DateFinancials.
condition: OriginationDate < DateFinancials

description: MaturityDate must be after DateFinancials.
condition: MaturityDate > DateFinancials

description: NonAccrualDate must be after OriginationDate.
condition: NonAccrualDate > OriginationDate

description: NonAccrualDate must be before MaturityDate.
condition: NonAccrualDate < MaturityDate

description: DateLastAudit must be before DateFinancials.
condition: DateLastAudit < DateFinancials

description: DateLastAudit must be after OriginationDate.
condition: DateLastAudit > OriginationDate

description: If InterestRateVariability is 'Fixed', then InterestRateIndex, InterestRateSpread, InterestRateCeiling, and InterestRateFloor must be empty.
condition: If InterestRateVariability = 'Fixed', then InterestRateIndex, InterestRateSpread, InterestRateCeiling, and InterestRateFloor must be null or empty.

description: If InterestRateVariability is 'Capped' or 'Floored', then InterestRateIndex and InterestRateSpread must be populated.
condition: If InterestRateVariability = 'Capped' or 'Floored', then InterestRateIndex and InterestRateSpread must not be null or empty.

description: The OriginationDate must be within a reasonable range from the current date.
condition: OriginationDate must be within the last 20 years.

description: The MaturityDate must be within a reasonable range from the current date.
condition: MaturityDate must be within the next 30 years.

description: The DateFinancials must be within a reasonable range from the current date.
condition: DateFinancials must be within the last 5 years.

description: InterestRateIndex must be selected from a predefined list.
condition: Value must be from the allowed list of interest rate indexes.

description: If InterestRateCeiling is populated, it should be greater than or equal to InterestRateSpread.
condition: If InterestRateCeiling is present, then InterestRateCeiling >= InterestRateSpread.

description: If InterestRateFloor is populated, it should be less than or equal to InterestRateSpread.
condition: If InterestRateFloor is present, then InterestRateFloor <= InterestRateSpread.

description: If InterestRateVariability is 'Variable', then InterestRateIndex should be from a list of valid variable rate indexes.
condition: If InterestRateVariability = 'Variable', then InterestRateIndex is from a valid list of variable rate indexes.

description: If GuarantorFlag is 'Yes', then the GuarantorName should be at least 5 characters long.
condition: If GuarantorFlag = 'Yes', then the length of GuarantorName >= 5.

description: If EntityName is populated, then the EntityName should be at least 5 characters long.
condition: If EntityName is present, then the length of EntityName >= 5.

description: ObligorName should be a valid business name.
condition: ObligorName should follow business naming conventions.

description: GuarantorName should be a valid business or personal name.
condition: GuarantorName should follow business or personal naming conventions.

description: EntityName should be a valid business name.
condition: EntityName should follow business naming conventions.

description: If the IndustryCodeType is 'ISIC', then IndustryCode must be a valid ISIC code.
condition: If IndustryCodeType = 'ISIC', then IndustryCode must be a valid ISIC code.

description: If LineOfBusiness is 'Agriculture', then IndustryCode should start with '11'.
condition: If LineOfBusiness = 'Agriculture', then IndustryCode should start with '11'.

description: If LineOfBusiness is 'Mining', then IndustryCode should start with '21'.
condition: If LineOfBusiness = 'Mining', then IndustryCode should start with '21'.

description: If LineOfBusiness is 'Utilities', then IndustryCode should start with '22'.
condition: If LineOfBusiness = 'Utilities', then IndustryCode should start with '22'.

description: If LineOfBusiness is 'Construction', then IndustryCode should start with '23'.
condition: If LineOfBusiness = 'Construction', then IndustryCode should start with '23'.

description: IndustryCodeType should be selected from a predefined list of allowed code types such as NAICS, SIC, GICS, and ISIC.
condition: Value must be from the allowed list of industry code types (NAICS, SIC, GICS, ISIC).

description: The OriginalInternalObligorID should match the InternalObligorID from a previous submission.
condition: OriginalInternalObligorID must exist as an InternalObligorID in a previous submission.

description: If the ObligorName contains the word 'Bank', then the IndustryCode should start with '5221'.
condition: If ObligorName contains 'Bank', then IndustryCode starts with '5221'.

description: InterestRate should be less than or equal to 50%.
condition: InterestRate <= 50

description: A reporting bank should report the Fields as defined by its financial spreading systems in accordance with its credit policy.
condition: Data must be consistent with the bank's financial spreading systems and credit policy.

description: The financial statement data fields should be populated with the most recent financial statement data available as of the report date.
condition: Data must reflect the most recent financial data in the consolidated holding company’s financial spreading system as of the report date.

description: NetSalesCurrent, OperatingIncome, DepreciationAmortization, InterestExpense, NetIncomeCurrent, and TotalLiabilities should be reported for the most recently available trailing twelve month (TTM) period, with the ending date indicated in DateFinancials.
condition: Values should represent the TTM period ending on the DateFinancials.

description: NetSalesPriorYear and NetIncomePriorYear should be reported for the TTM period ended one year prior to the date indicated in DateFinancials.
condition: Values should represent the TTM period ending one year prior to DateFinancials.

description: If an obligor lacks trailing twelve months of financial information, provide the underwritten annual information for NetSalesCurrent, OperatingIncome, DepreciationAmortization, InterestExpense, NetIncomeCurrent and TotalLiabilities, with the ending date indicated in DateFinancials.
condition: If TTM data is unavailable, the underwritten annual information should be used, ending on DateFinancials.

description: If an obligor lacks trailing twelve months of financial information, provide the underwritten annual information for NetSalesPriorYear and NetIncomePriorYear, with the ending date one year prior to the date indicated in DateFinancials.
condition: If TTM data is unavailable, the underwritten annual information should be used, ending one year prior to DateFinancials.
